Brands Looking for Ambassadors in 2025: Top Picks for Micro-Influencers

In 2025, brands are increasingly seeking micro-influencers (10K–50K followers) as ambassadors due to their 15–20% engagement rates, compared to 5% for larger creators (Influencer Marketing Hub, 2024). From makeup brands sending PR packages to lifestyle companies offering long-term partnerships, this guide highlights brands looking for ambassadors and how Newcollab connects you to them.

Find Ambassador Programs with Newcollab

Get bids from brands seeking micro-influencer ambassadors.

Join Now

Why Brands Seek Micro-Influencer Ambassadors

Ambassador programs leverage micro-influencers for long-term partnerships, offering consistent promotion and higher ROI (6:1 vs. 2:1 for mega-influencers). Benefits include:

  • Authenticity: Niche audiences trust micro-influencers.
  • Cost-Effective: Deals range from $100–$1,500 per post.
  • Loyalty: Long-term collabs build stronger brand-creator bonds.

Top Brands Looking for Ambassadors

1. e.l.f. Cosmetics (Makeup)

e.l.f. Cosmetics seeks micro-influencers for ambassador programs, sending PR packages for makeup tutorials.

  • Niche: Beauty, makeup.
  • Campaigns: Tutorial videos, product reviews (~$150–$500).
  • Requirements: 10K+ followers, beauty-focused content.

‘Newcollab got me an e.l.f. ambassador deal worth $450!’

- Ava L., Beauty Creator

2. Boohoo (Fashion)

Boohoo offers ambassador programs for micro-influencers to showcase trendy outfits on Instagram.

  • Niche: Fashion, lifestyle.
  • Campaigns: Outfit posts (~$100–$400).
  • Requirements: 10K+ followers, aesthetic content.

3. Alo Yoga (Fitness)

Alo Yoga partners with fitness micro-influencers for ambassador roles, promoting activewear.

  • Niche: Fitness, yoga.
  • Campaigns: Workout videos (~$200–$600).
  • Requirements: 10K+ followers, fitness focus.

4. HelloFresh (Food)

HelloFresh seeks foodie micro-influencers for ambassador programs, sending PR packages for recipe content.

  • Niche: Food, lifestyle.
  • Campaigns: Cooking videos (~$150–$400).
  • Requirements: 10K+ followers, food content.

5. MVMT (Accessories)

MVMT collaborates with micro-influencers for watch and accessory promotions on Instagram.

  • Niche: Fashion, accessories.
  • Campaigns: Lifestyle posts (~$100–$350).
  • Requirements: 10K+ followers, stylish content.
